game_description: Adrenaline-fueled, high-speed arcade game! Controls: Move head to dodge obstacles. Music: Fallen & Dirty Angel by THE PHASE https://www.jamendo.com/album/13125/dogma SFX: Menu button sounds from Halfquake by Muddasheep "Airborne Sound - Airy Whooshes" by Nikolay Overchenko & Sonniss BFXR explosion
review_1: What an incredibly simple yet amazing and addictive game! If you can last for 5 minutes, it's a great leg workout of said duration. Devs, please add hand tracking so that players can be more free and less encumbered while playing! That's the only improvement that initially comes to mind. I'm excited to see if or how this evolves!
review_2: Then use this, addictive as hell.
